Package exceptions

Classes containing all the exceptions used to run the social network properly.

These classes contain the following classes : - BadEntryException,ItemBookAlreadyExistsException, ItemFilmAlreadyExistsException,MemberAlreadyExistsException,NotItemException,NotMemberException,NotTestReportException

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hishame MEZAZIGH/Soufiane EL KALADOUI
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadEntryException
    BadEntryException is raised when some ISocialNetwork method is called with a non-correct parameter value.
    ItemBookAlreadyExistsException
    ItemBookAlreadyExistsException is raised when trying to add a new book whereas a book with the same name is already registered in the ISocialNetwork (same name : not case-sensitive and leadings/trailings blanks are not taken into account)
    ItemFilmAlreadyExistsException
    ItemFilmAlreadyExistsExceptiopn is raised when trying to add a new film whereas a film with the same name is already registered in the ISocialNetwork (same name : not case-sensitive and leadings/trailings blanks are not taken into account)
    MemberAlreadyExistsException
    MemberAlreadyExistsException is raised when trying to add a new member whereas a member with the same pseudo is already registered in the ISocialNetwork (same pseudo : not case-sensitive and leadings/trailings blanks are not taken into account)
    NotItemException
    NotItemException is raised when some item can not be found in the ISocialNetwork
    NotMemberException
    NotMemberException is raised when some member can not be found in the ISocialNetwork
    NotTestReportException
    NotTestReportException is raised when some TestReport can not be created with the given arguments
